alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 02 at 3:25AM PST until January 03 at 9:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...A Frost Advisory is in effect early this morning and again late tonight and early Monday morning. * WHERE...San Diego County Valleys. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 8 AM PST this morning. For the Frost Advisory, from midnight tonight to 9 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Through early this morning, and again late tonight through mid morning Monday, temperatures of 33 to 36 degrees are expected, possibly dropping to freezing in a couple of spots. The colder temperatures are most likely to occur in wind-sheltered locations.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
